system:
note description: "Abstraction for objects that have a tooltip property." legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." keywords: "tooltip, popup, hint" date: "$Date: 2013-05-20 16:15:17 -0700 (Mon, 20 May 2013) $" revision: "$Revision: 92557 $"
deferred class ../interface/ev_tooltipable.xmlEV_TOOLTIPABLE
inherit ../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY redefine ../interface/ev_tooltipable.xml#f_implementationimplementation, ../interface/ev_tooltipable.xml#f_is_in_default_stateis_in_default_state end
feature -- Access
f_tooltip../interface/ev_tooltipable.xml#f_tooltiptooltip: FalseSTRING_32 -- Tooltip displayed on Current. -- If Result is empty then no tooltip displayed. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do Result := ../interface/ev_tooltipable.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_tooltipable_i.xml#f_tooltiptooltip ensure bridge_ok: ../interface/ev_tooltipable.xml#f_is_bridge_okis_bridge_ok (Result) not_void: Result /= Void cloned: ../interface/ev_tooltipable.xml#f_is_clonedis_cloned (Result) end
feature -- Element change
f_set_tooltip../interface/ev_tooltipable.xml#f_set_tooltipset_tooltip (a_tooltip: FalseREADABLE_STRING_GENERAL) -- Assign a_tooltip to ../interface/ev_tooltipable.xml#f_tooltiptooltip. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed tooltip: a_tooltip /= Void do ../interface/ev_tooltipable.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_tooltipable_i.xml#f_set_tooltipset_tooltip (a_tooltip) ensure tooltip_assigned: ../interface/ev_tooltipable.xml#f_tooltiptooltip.Falsesame_string_general (a_tooltip) cloned: ../interface/ev_tooltipable.xml#f_tooltiptooltip /= a_tooltip end
f_remove_tooltip../interface/ev_tooltipable.xml#f_remove_tooltipremove_tooltip -- Make ../interface/ev_tooltipable.xml#f_tooltiptooltip empty. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do ../interface/ev_tooltipable.xml#f_set_tooltipset_tooltip ("") ensure tooltip_removed: ../interface/ev_tooltipable.xml#f_tooltiptooltip.Falseis_empty end
feature -- Contract support
f_is_bridge_ok../interface/ev_tooltipable.xml#f_is_bridge_okis_bridge_ok (a_string: FalseSTRING_32): FalseBOOLEAN -- If a_string equal implementation's ../interface/ev_tooltipable.xml#f_tooltiptooltip? do Result := a_string.Falseis_equal (a_string) end
f_is_cloned../interface/ev_tooltipable.xml#f_is_clonedis_cloned (a_string: FalseSTRING_32): FalseBOOLEAN -- If a_string same instance as implementation's ../interface/ev_tooltipable.xml#f_tooltiptooltip? do Result := a_string /= ../interface/ev_tooltipable.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_tooltipable_i.xml#f_tooltiptooltip end
feature {NONE} -- Contract support
f_is_in_default_state../interface/ev_tooltipable.xml#f_is_in_default_stateis_in_default_state: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is Current in its default state? do Result := ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_in_default_statePrecursor {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY} and ../interface/ev_tooltipable.xml#f_tooltiptooltip.Falseis_empty end
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_implementation../interface/ev_tooltipable.xml#f_implementationimplementation: ../implementation_interface/ev_tooltipable_i.xmlEV_TOOLTIPABLE_I -- Responsible for interaction with native graphics toolkit.
